p: The results regarding the TP content of raw materials and final products are depicted in Table 2 expressed as gallic acid equivalents (GAE). One can notice that the highest content of TP can be found in cloves ( Syzygium aromaticum L.) powder (130.9 ± 2.71 mg GAE/g) and cocoa (109.70 ± 1.93 mg GAE/g), while the lowest value was obtained in soy lecithin (11.04 ± 0.45 mg GAE/g).
